features: 2021 newest Gel Honeycomb Doughnut Design seat cushion for office desk chair&car seat driver.

PRESSURE RELIEF & COMFORT COOLING: Advanced column-buckling technology disperses your body weight evenly, eliminating pressure on the uncomfortable pressure points. This unique structure also increases air circulation to keep your bottom cool.Reducing pain for coccyx,tailbone,hip,lower

NO MORE SEAT SWEAT: Unlike your memory foam office chair cushion,car seat cushion,or foam wheelchair cushion.Our seat cushion is with honeycomb design,the built-in, free-flowing air channels will prevent seat sweat and stay comfort cooling instead of heating where you're sitting.

Excellent Flexible & Not Easily Deformed: The Gel seat cushion with soft and elastic gel material, double design, excellent flexibility, can be squeezed back to the original shape immediately after stretching, it will always maintain its original shape and it won't lose its support, even after a long term use. It is more durable than ordinary cushion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's not too thick and its quite spongy
reviews.reviewText: I have sciatica. So I like to carry it with me and place it on the chair or couch. I use it on the side of my sciatic irritation in shortly and away from that spot. The pad helps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The gel is hard and was not very comfortable to me. It does do the job I needs to do. Easy to take with you and to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure it works for me
reviews.reviewText: Had this cushion for about 4 days now. It doesn’t seem to be doing anything special. Though, in defense of the cushion, I may be doing something wrong. I will still keep sitting on it, regardless. I do like the fact it is slim-lined. I had another that was hard and made me feel like I was in a booster chair…it was toooooo high

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my butt, I travelled 10 hours it didn’t hurt
reviews.reviewText: Love love this , helped my buttt so much traveling sitting for 10 hours . Buy it and use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort from a doughnut
reviews.reviewText: The person I bought it for loves it says it keeps her bum from hurting so item works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hurts tail bone
reviews.reviewText: I have bad back & trying physical therapy so i don't have to have surgery. I am forced to sit or lay 50% of the day because it hurts lower back to walk. Sitting causes tailbone to ache. Bought this thinking it would help. It made it worse because its not designed to ease pressure on tail bone - it needs a small section at back to be cut out so tailbone doesn't rest on it. I sent it back. Thank goodness Amazon allows returns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Person who received it, liked it 👍
reviews.reviewText: That it was used and appreciated 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Donut is nice and soft.
reviews.reviewText: Box arrived unsealed with no paperwork inside. I don't know which side of the cushion my 96 year old husband should sit on. This was purchased for pressure sores but the hole looks very small. I'm not sure how it will work for him.
